src:
Siap-siap, Transfer ke Bank Pakai OVO Cs Kena Biaya
05 Nov 2019, 01:16 by Sylke Febrina Laucereno


Tim Infografis: Andhika Akbarayansyah

Jakarta - Pengiriman uang antar bank saat ini memang dikenakan biaya sekitar Rp 6.500 hingga Rp 7.500 setiap kali transaksi. Namun hadir layanan fintech sistem pembayaran dompet elektronik yang menawarkan promo gratis biaya kirim.Misalnya OVO, ewallet besutan Lippo Group ini memberikan kemudahan dan gratis biaya transfer uang ke bank manapun. Namun pada 12 Desember 2019 OVO tak lagi menggratiskan biaya alias berbayar Rp 2.500 per transaksi.Apakah ini menandakan era bakar uang sudah berakhir? Berikut berita selengkapnya:Lanjut ke halaman berikutnya >>>(kil/ang)
text:
Get ready, Transfer to Bank Using OVO Cs Can be Charged
05 Nov 2019, 01:16 by Sylke Febrina Laucereno


Infographics Team: Andhika Akbarayansyah

Jakarta - Interbank money transfers are currently charged around Rp. 6,500 to Rp. 7,500 for each transaction. But there is an electronic wallet payment system fintech service that offers free shipping promos. For example OVO, this firewall made by Lippo Group provides easy and free money transfers to any bank. But on December 12, 2019 OVO no longer eliminated the alias alias fee of Rp 2,500 per transaction. Does this indicate that the era of burning money is over? Here's the full story: Continue to the next page >>> (kil / ang)
